mapper.update: update b_prerece set keyid=keyid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,contractid=#{contractid} ,traderid=#{traderid} ,billcode=#{billcode} ,origin=#{origin} ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,quantity=#{quantity} ,price=#{price} ,manpowercose=#{manpowercose} ,amount=#{amount} ,settleid=#{settleid} ,checkno=#{checkno} ,accid=#{accid} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} where keyid=#{keyid}

update b_prerece set keyid=keyid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,contractid=#{contractid} ,traderid=#{traderid} ,billcode=#{billcode} ,origin=#{origin} ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,quantity=#{quantity} ,price=#{price} ,manpowercose=#{manpowercose} ,amount=#{amount} ,settleid=#{settleid} ,checkno=#{checkno} ,accid=#{accid} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and contractid=#{Where_contractid} and traderid=#{Where_traderid} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and origin=#{Where_origin} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingyear=#{Where_producingyear} and quantity=#{Where_quantity} and price=#{Where_price} and manpowercose=#{Where_manpowercose} and amount=#{Where_amount} and settleid=#{Where_settleid} and checkno=#{Where_checkno} and accid=#{Where_accid} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.contractid "contractid", t.traderid "traderid", t.billcode "billcode", t.origin "origin", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.quantity "quantity", t.price "price", t.manpowercose "manpowercose", t.amount "amount", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_prerece t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.contractid "contractid", t.traderid "traderid", t.billcode "billcode", t.origin "origin", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.quantity "quantity", t.price "price", t.manpowercose "manpowercose", t.amount "amount", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_prerece t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.origin=#{origin} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.quantity=#{quantity} and t.price=#{price} and t.manpowercose=#{manpowercose} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.contractid "contractid", t.traderid "traderid", t.billcode "billcode", t.origin "origin", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.quantity "quantity", t.price "price", t.manpowercose "manpowercose", t.amount "amount", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_prerece t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.origin=#{origin} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.quantity=#{quantity} and t.price=#{price} and t.manpowercose=#{manpowercose} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}
mapper.delete: delete from b_prerece where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and contractid=#{Where_contractid} and traderid=#{Where_traderid} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and origin=#{Where_origin} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingyear=#{Where_producingyear} and quantity=#{Where_quantity} and price=#{Where_price} and manpowercose=#{Where_manpowercose} and amount=#{Where_amount} and settleid=#{Where_settleid} and checkno=#{Where_checkno} and accid=#{Where_accid} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.contractid "contractid", t.traderid "traderid", t.billcode "billcode", t.origin "origin", t.billdate "billdate", t.billstate "billstate", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.quantity "quantity", t.price "price", t.manpowercose "manpowercose", t.amount "amount", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.updatetime "updatetime", gp.groupname, c.companyname, gd.graindepotname, s.storagename, g.grainname, ga.grainattrname, td.tradername, st.settlename, ac.accname from b_prerece t left join l_group gp on t.groupid=gp.groupid left join l_company c on t.companyid=c.companyid left join l_graindepot gd on t.graindepotid=gd.graindepotid left join l_storage s on t.storageid=s.storageid left join l_grain g on t.grainid=g.grainid left join l_grainattr ga on t.grainattrid=ga.grainattrid left join l_trader td on t.traderid=td.traderid left join l_settle st on t.settleid=st.settleid left join l_account ac on t.accid=ac.accid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.origin=#{origin} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.quantity=#{quantity} and t.price=#{price} and t.manpowercose=#{manpowercose} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}

select count(*) from b_prerece t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.origin=#{origin} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.quantity=#{quantity} and t.price=#{price} and t.manpowercose=#{manpowercose} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}
